Dialogue: Damn kid, one of those planks smack you on the head before the orphanage came down?
You have a welt the size of the moon on your head.
What a shame, terrible to see children go so soon . . . I'm sure those were your friends.
Anyways, we've had no luck finding Eli, so it looks like we're both having a rough day.
Were you surprised when you woke up this morning? I told you the world wasn't going to end.
Business was booming because of the gullable idiots in this town. I'm richer than ever! HAHA!
Alright kid, I got money to count. If you see Barry and Jerry tell them not to come back until they find Eli.
Let's hope the world ends again so I can keep cashing out. HAHA!
Next time you visit, clean yourself will you?
